Pre tag(used to display text without ignoring spaces and nextline)
The tranquility of early morning is a unique and fleeting experience. 
        As dawn breaks, the world is bathed in a gentle, golden light, 
        and the air is crisp and fresh. Birds begin their melodic symphony, filling the silence with a chorus of cheerful songs. 
        The hustle and bustle of daily life have yet to commence, allowing a moment of calm reflection.
